explains: v. 阐明，指导；教导，启迪；<古>照耀，照亮（物体）

sentences.en: It was an elite that believed its task was to enlighten the multitude.
sentences.cn: 精英人物都会认为自己的职责就是启迪群众。

sentences.en: A few dedicated doctors have fought for years to enlighten the profession.
sentences.cn: 少数富有献身精神的医生为启蒙这一行业而奋斗多年。

sentences.en: Can you enlighten her on this subject?
sentences.cn: 对这个问题你能启发启发她吗？
